sentences.english: The role of lead car has been rotated which is great and a bit of fun.
sentences.chinese: 领队的车已被旋转的作用是一个伟大的一点乐趣。

sentences.english: What's more, Self-drive traveling can bring people a lot of fun.
sentences.chinese: 而且，自驾游能带给人们很多乐趣。

sentences.english: Surgent power output of All New Bora makes your driving pleasure easy on the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 全新宝来澎湃的动力输出让您的驾驶乐趣一触即发。

sentences.english: High-speed thrills are one of the chief attractions of skiing on grass.
sentences.chinese: 享受高速滑行的快感，是滑草主要的乐趣之一。

sentences.english: Mike: Making dumplings is time-consuming, but it's fun.
sentences.chinese: 包饺子很费时间，但也是一种乐趣。

sentences.english: Slip away to innocent days with this fantastically fun collection of jigsaws with a nostalgic theme.
sentences.chinese: 溜掉无辜天这个亲密乐趣收集灵感与怀旧主题。

sentences.english: Reading informational texts for pleasure or to learn new information.
sentences.chinese: 以获得乐趣或获取信息为目地阅读说明文。

sentences.english: It is still inconceivably first-rate fun on spruced slopes.
sentences.chinese: 它仍然令人不可置信，一流的山坡上耸立的乐趣。

sentences.english: The newest version of the outrageously fun, smash-hit board game, Cranium?
sentences.chinese: 粗暴乐趣的新版本，捣毁击中了棋，头盖骨？

sentences.english: Instead of looking at leaves as something to rake, think of them as potential fun.
sentences.chinese: 与其把树叶扫走扔掉，不如找找它潜在的乐趣。

sentences.english: These images are done by Mark Fredrickson. Caricatures are always so fun.
sentences.chinese: 漫画总是给人带来乐趣。

sentences.english: Taking the wheel of C5 Airscape is a total and continuous experience in driving pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 走碳五鸟瞰轮是在驾驶乐趣和持续的总经验。

sentences.english: No2. Nothing can interest you in the real life.
sentences.chinese: 感到现实生活中没有什么事情能引起自己的乐趣。

sentences.english: Hand hooping with a hula hoop is fun because of the large number of possibilities for variety in tricks.
sentences.chinese: 手用呼拉圈套箍，是因为各种可能性大批过关乐趣。

sentences.english: And now you can enjoy on-line shopping comfortably at home.
sentences.chinese: 大家以后既可安在家中，享受网上购物的乐趣。

sentences.english: Organize group events so everyone can have fun and collaborate.
sentences.chinese: 组织小组活动所以每个人都能获得乐趣和协作。

definition: to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
to like/to take pleasure in/keen on/fond of/interest/hobby/appetite for/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be playful/to be fond of one's fun
